amendment.description: Amendment authorizes block grant funding for projects to improve school security including the placement and use of metal detectors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 37 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to authorize block grant funding for projects to improve school security including the placement and use of metal detectors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
